## Checklist
- [ ] Profile is valid YAML/JSON and passes schema checks
- [ ] IPFS CID provided or updated

- [ ] Visuals (DAO Nutrition Label, etc.) are attached if required
- [ ] Documentation updated (README / roadmap / logs)
